body:
Hey guys, haven't made a post in a while and wanted to help the community bond a bit by getting them to see if anybody has something in common with themselves, or even just find a new game you would like to try out and maybe you will find it fun :)

My Favourite game would be PL Story 2 by Kairosoft Co LTD, but really any game from them is good :)

Right here for you android users if ya wanna get it: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.kairosoft.android.soccer2_en&hl=en
Not sure if there is one for apple tho, don't use any of their products xD

title: Favourite Cell Phone Game?

replies.body: Monster Hunter Freedom Unite iOS. <3333 Lifeeeeee.
replies.body_tagged: Monster Hunter Freedom Unite iOS. <3333 Lifeeeeee.

replies.body:
Yas sank yuuu~

What songs do you play?

When I played over the summer (on someone else's phone) I played either Blue L or Red L the most xD

replies.body:
I started playing "Summoners War" about one month ago, and I absolutely love it! :)

I highly recommend it to anyone, but it is quite a large game, so do not install it if you do not have a lot of memory left on your phone.
replies.body_tagged:
